SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BoardTest
One of the simpler test classes, so a good point to start understanding how testing JPacman has been setup.
CellTest
Test suite for methods working directly on Cells.
EngineTest
Systematic testing of the game state transitions.
GameTest
Series of test cases for the game itself.
GameTestCase
This is a JUnit test class, intended for use in cases where a filled Pacman board is necessary.
GuestTest
Test the Cell Guest association.
ImageFactoryTest
Fairly basic test cases for the image factory.
MoveTest
This class offers a test suite for the Move class hierarchy from Pacman.
ObserverTest
Test that the observer update method is properly called upon changes.
PacmanTest
Systematic acceptance test for Pacman.
PlayerMoveTest
Specialize the general MoveTest test suite to one that is tailored to PlayerMoves.
TestAll
If you'd like your class to be tested, include it below in the list of suite classes.
TestUtils
Utility methods that help in testing.
